name: copytrade-pro
description: Professional trading application with multi-broker support

scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && mkdir -p backend/public && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/public/

author: Raviteja Kamalapuram
